citation: Proclamation under the Local Government (Building and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1993 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Local Government (Building and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1993

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the request of the Central Highlands Council, by this my proclamation made under section 43(4) of the Local Government (Building and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1993 declare â€“

        (a) the area defined in Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be a changing building area; and
        (b) that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
23 July 1998

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. SWAN

Minister for Local Government

SCHEDULE 1 - Wayatinah changing building area

All that area of land at Wayatinah in the municipal area of Central Highlands defined in Certificate of Title 115190/1.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 July 1998

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
